Reviews.Title: Rhino
Reviews.Author: Rhino
Reviews.Content: Product was delivered  before expected .Works great for hallways and stairwells and outside walkways.Real happy with the product, works as a security lite with the motion detector surprise.

Reviews.Title: Light me up
Reviews.Author: Bernice M. Hall
Reviews.Content: Not only do these sensors perform excellently to let me see to get the door unlocked, I no longer feel uncomfortable walking on my deck in the country dark and no more unwanted animals prowling around.

Reviews.Title: Works great.
Reviews.Author: Rita Henline "chitard"
Reviews.Content: great product, very bright and turns on quickly. We use ours on the front deck and the weather has not effected it at all.

Reviews.Title: Great for Awhile!
Reviews.Author: hot cuchi
Reviews.Content: I did order this Motion Sensor light for my basement, and I thought it was just what my hubby and I needed for a light to keep from tripping over things. Well, I am writing this review because the light worked great for about two weeks and then the unit started to flicker! My hubby and I tried to put in new batteries, but to no avail, because no matter what we did to try and fix it - nothing worked. Not only did the light begin to flicker, we noticed that there was a crack in the lighting system!  We are truly sorry because this motion sensor worked so well, but I do not think that we are going to invest anymore to buy this specific unit. Too bad!!

Reviews.Title: One bulb not working already
Reviews.Author: rodney mazzaro
Reviews.Content: One led bulb was not working at time of arrival .i am  Sure there are more to follow.time will tell
